resources.string: tap here to extract the text written on the page from Camera
note: IMG2TXT app can not identify handwritten text
You must accept the permission to use camera and storage to let the app use camera inside the app to take image of books and papers
OCR image then copy the extracted text

Welcome 
I advice you to 
- tap on image icon to grab a picture from your gallery. 
- tap on camera icon to take a photo of a paper or document.
You can not use camera to take photos of papers and documents because you did not grant the permissions to the app.

IMG2TXT app could not extract written text properly maybe because of bad quality of the image. Please choose another image or re-take the picture. \nnote: IMG2TXT OCR app can not extract handwritten text.

Words with color-coded accuracy (OCR confidence): 
this tells you how confident the app in the identified word.
